@thewhyaxis btw appreciate the conversation on this Sunday morning, sometimes Twitter feels like yelling out towards a mountain range
@thewhyaxis I tried to sum up what I want to see here: https://t.co/o4cvc8tsrA maybe I should have been clearer that it's what I want to do
@thewhyaxis Been trying to get in touch with anyone at @firstlook for a couple of weeks now. Saw De Correspondent- exactly what I'm thinking
@thewhyaxis I think we are in a unique moment where something new is happening, and the best hacks of our generation making it happen
@thewhyaxis good question. Right now, I really want the journalists at @firstlook create beautiful stories, and tools to do data journalism
I want to work long hours to get something really important into the world. those are the moments I am happiest ( if I can rest after )
I want to Just Do It and not wait for approval, or for anyone to ask. But I also want to do things that are important to other people.
I want a mission. A goal. A company to build. A product to make successful. A dataset to explore. A story to unravel. A team to learn from.
I want to turn out some great stories. Stories people re-read. Stories people force their friends to read, watch, or listen to.
I want to always be making tools, so that everything I learn and accomplish is made easier and more accessible to those that follow.
I want to do things in ways that have never been done before. I want to try things for the first time that become industry standard later.
I want to help my friends accomplish amazing things. I want to help them do everything they want to do, so I can learn alongside them.
I want to wake up in the morning and spend my day talking to people way, way smarter than me. I want to keep getting surprised by new things
I want to make things better. I want to do everything I can so Dan Siegel can be mayor. So kids can learn to program.
I want to be part of a community, and help it. I love Oakland for this. I love the community there. So many people working together.
I want to change the world. The most appealing way to do that is journalism. I want to tell truths so beautifully they cant be ignored.
This morning I woke up in a bit of a malaise. Trying to figure out what I want. Trying to make some plans.

Going through #occupyoakland tapes...  A kid yells "I may be younger than you, but put that fucking gun down!" love it.
@jaspergregory Though I can wholeheartedly and without hesitation say I believe that you have nothing to fear at GA... no more than others.
@jaspergregory I think you'll find a lot of people in #oo who dislike what you have to say, but willing to physically defend ur right 2 say.
@jaspergregory The only way I can think of to "deal with" that issue is to have an #ooStreamSummit, with all sides of this argument.
.@jaspergregory Under what circumstances would you come to GA? Or an action? Or a discussion of transparency? Any? Important to understand.
RT @hyphy_republic: What's sad is frauds like @jaspergregory can seem legitimate to people who support occupy elsewhere @OakScott @alyss ...
@jaspergregory I'd much prefer to do my #oo from Twitter too, but can't- decisions are made together, in person, with accountability, at GA.
@jaspergregory You can either philosophize & criticize from the sidelines, or actually put the work in to grow it. That = talking to people.
.@jaspergregory Progress will not be made through pontificating (both sides, symptom of broadcasting out instead of DISCUSSING) online.
@OakScott Dueling monologues is an incredible way to put it... kind of inevitable with regards to Twitter, I think. Power in face-to-face.
If you critique with the intent of growth that is valiant. If you critique but don't intend on engaging in a discussion on it you're a troll
I think that if you want to criticize #oo #occupyoakland transparency/open-ness, you owe it to yourself/#oo to COME DOWN and talk about it.
@JohnSeal3 Also do you really wanna act as if a meeting of various media/streamers at #ooStreamSummit WOULDN'T BE LIVESTREAMED? o.O
@JohnSeal3 This discussion is hella open- held on Twitter- happening all around us. Face-to-face discussion is key to agreeing on anything.
I think a #ooStreamSummit would be helpful, to get this talk off Twitter, get people talking in person, deciding together, THAT'S OCCUPY #oo
.@jaspergregory Would you be willing to come to a media/livestreamer/transparency summit as I'm suggesting? Discussion is key.
@alyssa011968 Mentioned you because I think you handle the balancing of documenting vs. revealing really well- could teach us all.

@socialistlib510 @OakFoSho @BellaEiko @alyssa011968 @VizFoSho et al - I think a discussion group / summit around #oo streaming&media needed
@OakScott @jaspergregory Sounds like its time for a Media Summit/GA to discuss these things in person. Twitter battles devolve, not evolve.

Importing Beatles discography, Bob Marley discography, and Radiohead discography. Overly happy.
Just lost a bunch of awesome work. Oh well.
If Illustrator is crashing right now I'm going to be fucking pissed.
I like typographic terms for things. I think that my bodytype is "bold". Somewhere between light and heavy. Is that sad?
Just pre-ordered GTA IV from Amazon, but got their free shipping. At the same time, I can't wait, and I made myself wait longer. Oh well.
Got a book on typography and an atlas of world war II battles at the bookstore.

Going to the mall. Perhaps I will purchase a hat. Or some reading material.
